name: icmc-emulator
description: An Emulator for the CPU developed at ICMC

scripts.build-modules: wasm-pack build --target web --reference-types --weak-refs --release --no-pack modules/mif && wasm-pack build --target web --reference-types --weak-refs --release --no-pack modules/emulator/backend

author: Vinicius Giroto <viniciusgiroto@usp.br> (https://giroto.dev)
